{{ professor.studentID }} {{ professor.student.cne }} {{ professor.course.name }}--{{ absence.course.annee }} {{ professor.nbrAbsence }}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Student} from "../models/Student.model"; import {StudentService} from "../services/student.service"; import {Professor} from "../models/Professor.model"; import {AbsenceService} from "../services/absence.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-professor', templateUrl: './professor.component.html', styleUrls: ['./professor.component.css'] }) export class ProfessorComponent implements OnInit { errorMsg!: object; professors !: Array ; constructor( private absenceService:AbsenceService ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.absenceService.getAbsences().subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ this.professors=data?._embedded.absences },error:(err)=>{ this.errorMsg=err.message; console.log(err) } }) } handelDeleteProfessor(professor: Professor) { } handelUpdateProfessor(professor: Professor) { } }
